Our Story and Vision

Two decades of excellence in medical equipment supply and technical support, driven by integrity and a deep understanding of healthcare needs.

Our Services

Medical Infection Control Solutions

Excellence in healthcare equipment since 2003

Who We Are

Over Two Decades of Medical Excellence

Medical Infection Control Solutions (MICS) brings more than twenty years of specialized experience in the medical field, with comprehensive knowledge spanning technical support, sales management, equipment maintenance, and turnkey project implementation.

build

Technical Support

Management and implementation of comprehensive technical solutions for healthcare facilities.

trending_up

Sales Management

Strategic sales oversight and marketing management for medical equipment and accessories.

settings

Maintenance & Repair

Expert service, repairs, and preventative maintenance for critical medical equipment.

construction

Installation

Professional installation of equipment ranging from individual units to complete turnkey projects.

Our Specialized Approach

The experience MICS has acquired is focused into a niche area of Equipment and Accessory supply, with qualified and trained technical back up, an area often misunderstood or misinterpreted by general companies and clients in the industry.

This highly specialized field requires someone with local knowledge as well as an understanding of the needs for each area of the equipment and technical support environment. This is the value-add that we bring to the market place.

The company is run with the highest level of Integrity, whilst always maintaining and valuing our Clients' needs and confidentiality.

Our Experience Is Your Advantage

Our experience includes networking and support with Private Groups and Public Sector entities at all levels within the supply chain. Our staff have been sales staff, managers, customers and suppliers, so we understand the relationship, supply and demand chain.

visibility

Our Vision

To be seen as the Leader in medical equipment accessory supply as well as back up from solid Clinical Engineering Technical support in the local medical industry.

stars

Our Goal

"To be the best service provider in our industry" - ensuring your company meets equipment and budget targets with value-added products and top talent for patient safety and customer satisfaction.

Strategically Located

Our Location

Centrally Positioned for Nationwide Service

MICS is based in Gauteng, South Africa's economic hub. Located just 20 minutes from the main airport, our strategic position makes us accessible to the rest of the country for any needs that may arise.

This central location enables us to provide prompt service and delivery to healthcare facilities nationwide, ensuring minimal downtime and maximum efficiency for our clients.

location_on Gauteng, South Africa
flight_takeoff 20 min from Airport
public Nationwide Service

Compliance & Quality Standards

We maintain the highest standards of compliance and quality in all our operations.

Level 4 BEE Certified
verified

BEE Certification

MICS is proud to hold a level 4 BEE (Broad-Based Black Economic Empowerment) rating, demonstrating our commitment to transformation and economic inclusion in South Africa.

BEE Level 4 Rating
Certificate Available Upon Request

Our commitment to compliance extends beyond certifications to every aspect of our operation, ensuring that we maintain the highest standards of quality, safety, and business ethics.
